titleStmt.title: An act published by the General Assembly of Scotland being a forme of examination at the speciall desire of the Kirke, by them thought to be so needfull, that every pastor exhort his flocke to buy the said booke and reade the same in their families, whereby they may be better instructed, and that the same may be read and learned in lector schooles.
titleStmt.author: Church of Scotland.

publicationStmt.publisher: First printed at Edinburg by R.W. And now reprinted at London by B. Alsop and are to be sold by Henry Walker,

notesStmt.note: Reproduction of the original in the Harvard University Library.
